name: Afterlife Airlines
description:
Help Jules look for his cat Parsnip, in  the airport between Life and Death!
Made for Black and White jam #0.9 in ~10 days 

Controls:

Move (both in world and menus): arrow buttons
Inspect and confirm: either [ENTER] or [Z]
Open Menu: [ESC] or [X]

Content Warnings: 

Discussions of death (both human and animal), mild swearing

Walkthrough: 

Google Docs
